subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Jets receiver Justin McCareins had to refocus after a humbling 2006 season in which he lost his starting job to Jerricho Cotchery and finished with only 23 receptions.
snippet: Jets receiver Justin McCareins had to refocus after a humbling 2006 season in which he lost his starting job to Jerricho Cotchery and finished with only 23 receptions.
